projectData.title: Recipe Book
projectData.description: The recipe book is a web page that uses an API to display recipes. It is also possible to save favorite recipes, for save the favorites is used the local storage

projectData.title: IxcamaShop
projectData.description: Project created for a relative using React and TypeScript. Its purpose is to function as a simple online catalog that displays and filters football team shirts. It is connected to a database using Supabase and deployed on Vercel, as the project is intended to be maintained without any costs.

projectData.title: EcoCard
projectData.description: Game created as part of my social service. It is a card game that uses stores (zustand) to control its functionality, in addition to the local storage functionality for game scores.
